name: CosmiCulture
description:
CosmiCulture is a top-down rpg about being a little guy on a big empty planet that you have been assigned to terraform. Start by planting lichen spores in order to turn the hard rock into farmable soil. But make sure you don't run out of oxygen!

Use arrow keys to move, "E" to interact, "I" to open inventory.
